home.title_hr: Mobilna kućica Lana - Vaš savršeni bijeg u prirodu
home.title_en: Mobile Home Lana - Your Perfect Escape to Nature
home.description_hr: Uživajte u mirnom odmoru u našoj potpuno opremljenoj mobilnoj kućici. Savršena za obitelji i prijatelje koji traže kombinaciju komfora i prirode.
home.description_en: Enjoy a peaceful vacation in our fully equipped mobile home. Perfect for families and friends seeking a combination of comfort and nature.

accommodation.description_hr: Potpuno opremljena mobilna kućica s 2 spavaće sobe, kuhinjom, kupaonicom, klimom, Wi-Fi-jem i privatnom terasom. Kapacitet do 6 osoba.
accommodation.description_en: Fully equipped mobile home with 2 bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and private terrace. Capacity up to 6 people.

gallery.description_hr: Pogledajte fotografije naše mobilne kućice, unutarnjih prostora i okolice.
gallery.description_en: View photos of our mobile home, interior spaces, and surroundings.

location.description_hr: Pronađite nas na karti i saznajte kako do nas. Udaljenost od plaže samo 300 metara.
location.description_en: Find us on the map and learn how to reach us. Only 300 meters from the beach.

availability.description_hr: Provjerite dostupnost i pošaljite upit za rezervaciju. Odaberite datume i kontaktirajte nas.
availability.description_en: Check availability and send a booking inquiry. Select your dates and contact us.

contact.description_hr: Kontaktirajte nas s bilo kakvim pitanjima. Rado ćemo vam pomoći s planiranjem vašeg odmora.
contact.description_en: Contact us with any questions. We'll be happy to help you plan your vacation.
